objects.text: ROTATABLE SPOUT | SPACE-SAVING DESIGN | RUSTPROOF 304 STAINLESS STEEL | CONVENIENT DIVIDERS

product_details.description: Stainless Steel 【ROTATABLE SPOUT】This kitchen sink caddy comes with a rotatable spout that swivels in three directions so that the water in the sponge can be directed to the sink. There won't be any water left on the countertop, you don't need to pull out the drip tray to clean it often, saving your cleaning time. 【SMALL VOLUME】 Cisily sponge holder is suitable for kitchens with limited space. It measures only 9.25"*3.97"*6.37", Holds a detergent bottle, a sponge ball and sink stopper. With an extra upgraded brush holder that can hold up to 4 small and large sized brushes, with the Cisily Sink caddy you can save countertop space perfectly. 【PREMIUM STURDY MATERIAL】 Cisily kitchen sink organizer is made of premium stainless steel which can effectively prevent rust and deformation. And you can clean it easily by rinsing it under a running tap. Take the clutter out of your countertops. 【REASONABLE DIVIDER DESIGN】 The sponge holder for kitchen sink ergonomic divider design allows it to have 3 separate storage spaces, Different items are placed in different areas. Make the most of every inch of space and make your kitchen look cleaner. 【SATISFACTION GUARANTEED】The CISILY kitchen sink organizer is ready to use upon receipt, no installation required and is widely used on counters or bathrooms, making it a satisfying gift. If you have any questions during use, please consult our customer service staff. We want to provide you with a pleasant shopping experience. USPTO patent：USD1045310S Color - Black ** Material - Black ** Product Dimensions - 9.25"L x 3.93"W x 6.3"H ** Item Weight - 100 Grams ** Brand - Cisily **

banner_details:
This banner features a modern and clean layout designed to promote a kitchen organization product. The background employs a smooth diagonal charcoal gradient, overlaid with subtle white divider lines and golden circular accents that create a dynamic but composed visual appeal. At the top, a bold white heading (`heading`) captures immediate attention, followed by a stylish subheading (`subheading`) in gold that suggests premium quality. Centrally placed is the product image (`product_image`) showcasing the item in a practical setting. Below it, a concise feature summary (`description`) highlights key selling points in uppercase white text. The price (`price`) is emphasized in large gold typography, paired with a prominent gold call-to-action button (`cta_background` with text `cta`) labeled in bold black, urging immediate purchase. Decorative gold dots are placed in corners to enhance visual balance and elegance.

**Color Palette:**
- Charcoal Gray: `#1a1a1a` to `#363636` (background gradient)
- Gold: `#D4AF37` (accents, subheading, price, and CTA background)
- White: `#FFFFFF` (heading and descriptive text)
- Black: `#000000` (CTA text)
product_color: The product image features a modern and minimalistic color palette, ideal for a clean, fresh advertisement banner. Dominant hues include sleek **black (#1C1C1C)** from the metal rack, providing structure and depth. Natural **light wood tones (#D2A679)** from the brush handles introduce warmth and an organic touch. Bold accents like the **yellow (#FFD700)** and **green (#0A5640)** sponge, along with the **sage green soap liquid (#7BAE7F)** in the transparent bottle, add visual contrast that draws attention. These colors are well-balanced, with neutral whites (#FFFFFF) and grays (#C0C0C0) keeping the image bright. The palette captures freshness, functionality, and elegance simultaneously.
